page.title: 15LOCAL FESTIVALS - Summer.
page.content:
On the first Saturday in July a 'Rose Queen Festival' is held in Duddon. This event is organised jointly by St.Peter's Church and Duddon School and attracts many people from the survey area.
A Rose Queen is chosen from the eleven year old girls at school and a procession of the Rose Queen, her attendants and a page-boy takes place at the start of the event. The Rose Queen and her retinue from the previous year are also invited to attend. The Rose Queen is crowned by an invited guest.
The event also includes diplays from the primary children, such as dancing and gymnastics. There is also a wide range of sideshows and stalls .
